title: Filter style wire frame
description: Shows all features, that do not comply to the filter of the BIM Building Scene Layer, as wire frame with an edge line.

type.description: Declares filter style of type wire frame.

edges.description: An object defining solid edges of a feature. [See more](https://developers.arcgis.com/web-scene-specification/objects/edges/) information on supported edges in ArcGIS clients.
